Title: The Lies We Tell But the Secrets We Keep Part 3
Director: Milon V. Parker, Milon V. Parker
Writer: Milon V. Parker (story), Milon V. Parker
Actors: Aaron Badie, Anita Nicole Brown, Andrea V. Dean, Rion Harrie
Plot: The conclusion to the epic urban saga of 'The Lies We Tell...' Roni seeks revenge on Tank because she feels as if Tank had something to do with Bri being shot. So she takes matters into her own hands.
